Author: avoao
Text: Crying actually releases a hormone (forget which one) that actually does make you feel better! I'm sorry I forget all the details, but something about that exact feeling you described - the dam breaking, release, and relief, is an amazing stress-relieving benefit of crying.   Basically, if you can find somewhere private and calm, let it all out. You'll definitely feel better afterwards. And I hope that whatever is making you feel this way gets better soon, or you find some solution. You're always free to vent here <3
